analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x374d60bc9678d16d024619d2dc3e5d235a5ab1ef.sol:
	Contract LykkToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x374d60bc9678d16d024619d2dc3e5d235a5ab1ef.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x374d60bc9678d16d024619d2dc3e5d235a5ab1ef.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
